alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:21AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, southeastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1221 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sugar City, or 20 miles north of La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, southeastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
